verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord, Keep ye judgment, and do justice: for my salvation is near to come, and my righteousness to be revealed.
verses.verse_html:
1Thus saith the Lord, Keep ye judgment, and do justice: for my salvation is near to come, and my righteousness to be revealed. ▼
▼ judgment: or, equity

tokens.definition: יַיִן yayin, yah'-yin; from an unused root meaning to effervesce; wine (as fermented); by implication, intoxication:—banqueting, wine, wine(-bibber).
tokens.kjv_translation_count: wine (138x), banqueting (1x), winebibbers (with H 5433) (1x).

tokens.definition: סָבָא çâbâʼ, saw-baw'; a primitive root; to quaff to satiety, i.e. become tipsy:—drunkard, fill self, Sabean, (wine-) bibber.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: drunkard (2x), winebibbers (1x), fill (1x), drunken (1x), variant (1x).

tokens.definition: שֵׁכָר shêkâr, shay-kawr'; from H7937 ; an intoxicant, i.e. intensely alcoholic liquor:—strong drink, drunkard, strong wine.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: strong drink (21x), strong wine (1x), drunkard (1x).

tokens.definition: מָחָר mâchâr, maw-khar'; probably from H309 ; properly, deferred, i.e. the morrow; usually (adverbially) tomorrow; indefinitely, hereafter:—time to come, tomorrow.
